name: Flameworld
description:
In Flameworld, you will play as Bianca the Fire Princess as she experiences an atypical day in the Land of Endless Flames.

Fight through the castle as you reach your parents, the Queen and King of Flames.

WASD - Move

Left Click - Melee

Right Click - Ranged

E - Skip dialogue

This game serves as a tie-in to Box of Dreams, another game I'm working on. Look out for updates on that game!
